001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007import org.junit.jupiter.api.Tag;
008
009/**
010 * The {@code Regression} annotation is used to mark test methods or test classes
011 * as part of the regression test suite. This annotation is a custom extension of
012 * JUnit's {@link Tag} annotation and automatically assigns the tag "Regression"
013 * to any test it is applied to.
014 *
015 * <p>By using this annotation, test execution frameworks that support tagged execution,
016 * such as JUnit and Maven Surefire Plugin, can selectively run regression tests.
017 *
018 * <h3>Integration:</h3>
019 * This annotation is used in conjunction with test execution tools to filter
020 * and execute regression-specific tests. It simplifies test categorization
021 * and improves maintainability in large test suites.
022 *
023 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
024 */
025@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
026@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD})
027@Tag("Regression")
028public @interface Regression {
029}
